root: // Please close program before editing this document! In other case changes might be overwritten // 3 // how many times watchdog retries to get value from PLC before error is shown and reconection is invoked True // autoconnect at startup 800 // program will force refresh values every ### miliseconds (small values can result in overloading CPU) NOTE: Program refreshes gui on every value change from PLC on its own! 200 // program will refresh values in settings form every ### miliseconds true // program will generate watchdog counter for PLC to check if PC is present on the network (value must be: "true" or "false") 6 // program will generate watchdog counter on specified profinet address (type is WORD; example/default value: "278") true // Disables Gui sub-Menus when connection is lost and prevents entry to sub-Menus 1000 // Določi na koliko časa se vpiše vzorec temperatur, ph vrednosti in ostalih podatkov v Log za saržo false // Omogoči delovanje programa brez prijavljenega uporabnika true // false false // // // // // true // indicates if tabpage is shown on GUI true // indicates if device is enabled - (gui, communication ...) LOGO1 // Showname 10.199.197.41 // format must be ###.###.###.### (192.168.0.1) IP of PLC "02.00" // format must be ##.## (00.03) TSAP is used for comunication between PLCs "20.00" // format must be ##.## (00.03) TSAP is used for comunication between PLCs true // value must be "true" or "false" .. enable or disable watchdog - watchdog is used for detecting comunication problems 2 // value must be number DOUBLE WORD format. Watchdog is used for detecting comunication problems. For example "100" if watchdog value is DOUBLE WORD on address 100 100 // value in miliseconds - frequency at which data aquisition is preformed - read, action, write, delay. (watchdog is also bound at this frequency) // // // true// true// LOGO2// 10.199.197.42// "02.00"// "20.00"// true// 4// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO3// 192.168.10.203// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 250// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO4// 192.168.10.204// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 254// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO5// 192.168.10.205// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 258// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO6// 192.168.10.206// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 262// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO7// 192.168.10.207// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 266// 200// // // // false// false// LOGO8// 192.168.10.208// "03.00"// "02.00"// true// 270// 200// // // // // // // Users paswords and permisions // admin // Displayname for user admin // Pasword for user true // Level of restriction:
